abstract: To attract American investors, the Man Group is expanding its product lineup, building up its local sales force and striking distribution deals with firms like Morgan Stanley.
snippet: To attract American investors, the Man Group is expanding its product lineup, building up its local sales force and striking distribution deals with firms like Morgan Stanley.
lead_paragraph: Founded 230 years ago near the banks of the Thames, the Man Group has transformed itself from a British barrel maker to a rum merchant to a $70 billion money manager dominant in Europe and Asia.

headline.main: Big British Hedge Fund Takes Aim at the States
